And the operation on the incision of them is that you consider then if the patient is humid, and the color of the tissue is white, humid, with subtle roots; then you insert a spatula in the wound, and have cauteries in the focus, for four to six times the section of it will expel its humor; and if the humor comes out, cauterize that.
E si vezes le malaute pauruc e temeros, guarda te de inscizio am ferr; mays lahoras pren fiel de plom recent fayt, e strenh am aquel atheil, la manieyra del qual es aquela que havem dita; e leyssa aquel per dos dias.	And if the patient is pale and fearful, guard yourself from incision with iron; but then take a piece of fresh lead, and apply it to that tissue, the handling of which is what we have said; and leave it for two days.
E aprop ajusta en la strictura del fil de plom; donc, no cesses strenher le plom granre devetz en theil, entro que sia abscindit e cayha per se ses trebalh.	And then adjust in the constriction of the thread of lead; thus, do not cease to apply the large lead plaster on the tissue, until it is absorbed and falls off by itself with its own effort.
Mays si theil es de grossa razitz, lahoras en la inscizio de lu es alcuna causa de temor e de paor, e majorment en aquel que es en le ventre.	But if the tissue is of coarse root, then in the incision of it there is some cause of fear and of pain, and especially in that which is in the belly.
Mays possibla es que tu inscindas la maytat de lu , e aprop cauteriza aquel per que no retorne.	It is possible that you must incise the mattress of them, and then cauterize that which does not return.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanada la plagua.	And then heal that which is inside so that the wound may be healed.
E guarda te que tu no presumas inscidir theil le qual es de fusca color, de pauc sentiment, de leg reguardament, quar aquel es absi cancros.	And beware that you do not attempt to incise the one which is of dark color, of little feeling, of light regard, for that is a cancerous abscess.
E yeu vindre am rememoracio de cranc aprop aysso.	And I will come to the memory of the sick person with a remedy afterwards.
Capitol .lii.	Chapter twelve.
De curacio de eminencia del umbilic.	On the treatment of the swelling of the navel.
Eminencia del umbilic es fayta per motas causas; o per fissuras del ciphac le qual es sobre le ventre, e yeys de lu la tela o budel segon que endeve en las autras rupturas; o per sanc le qual flueys de vena o de arceria segon que es denant dit, o per ventositat coarctada en lu.	Swelling of the navel is caused by many reasons; either by fissures of the ciphac which is above the belly, and from it the tissue or intestine protrudes according to the other ruptures; or by blood that flows from a vein or artery as it has been said before, or by constricted inflammation within it.
Mays si es per fissura del ciphac e per yssiment de la tela, lahoras la color del apostema es semblant a la color del cors; e es leon ses dolor, e aprop appar de divers situament.	But if it is due to a fissure of the ciphac and by protrusion of the tissue, then the color of the abscess is similar to the color of the body; and it is less painful, and then appears with diverse symptoms.
E si es per egressio del budel, lahoras le situament de aquel am lu de aquo que havem recontat, de mays vehement diversitat, e cum tu premes aquel am les tieus ditz es occultat, e aprop retorna; e fort leu es am lu so, e es magnificat mot deves le introt de banh e vehement trebalh.	And if it is due to the protrusion of the intestine, then the situation of that with it is what we have recounted before, of much more violent diversity, and when you press on that with your fingers it is hidden, and then returns; and it is foul-smelling and it is magnified by many movements of vomiting and violent turmoil.
Mays si per humiditat, lahoras es leon e no es occultat quan premes am la tua ma, ni es constrengut, ni es cregut.	More often because of humidity, it is evident and not hidden when you press with your hand, nor is it constricted, nor is it believed.
E si es per sanc, lahoras am aquestz senhals apareys le apostema a negror declinant.	And if it is due to blood, then with this symptom the abscess appears on the declining blackish area.
Mays si es per carn nada, lahoras es apostema greu, gros e dur, e es ficat segon una quantitat.	More often if it is from flesh alone, then the abscess is serious, thick and hard, and the liver is affected according to a quantity.
Mays si es per ventositat, lahoras le tocament de lu es leon.	More often if it is due to flatulence, then the touch on him is evident.
E la operacio en lu es que consideras lahoras si la eminencia de l’umbilic es per sanc de arceria, o de vena, o per ventositat; lahoras cove que sias prohibit de la curacio de lu, quar en aquela es temor e paor ayssi cum t’e ensenhat en le capitol en le qual he dit les apostemas per arceria e per vena.	And the operation on him is that you consider then if the prominence of the navel is due to blood of the liver, or of a vein, or from flatulence; then beware that you are prohibited from the cure of it, for in that there is fear and dread, as it is taught to you in the chapter in which I have spoken about the abscesses from the liver and from a vein.
E si la eminencia del umbilic es per le budel o per la tela, lahoras cove que comandes al malaute que tengua le ale sieu, e sia stant extendut; e aprop senha am tenta en le circuit de tot le umbilic, e aprop comanda a lu que stia envers entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos, e aprop circunda am spatum lat en le circuit del umbilic sobre le loc le qual has senhat am la tenta; e aprop exten la maytat del apostema a las partidas desus am unci gran; e aprop lia en le circuit am fiel fort o am ceda e la manieyra del liar decent.	And if the prominence of the navel is due to the intestine or from the membrane, then beware that you order the patient to hold his legs up, and be standing stretched out; and then sew with a thread around the entire navel, and then order him to stand bent between your hands on his back, and then circle with a spatula flat in the area of the navel over the place where you have sewn with the thread; and then stretch the majority of the abscess to the lower parts down with a large needle; and then tie in the area with a strong or thin thread and the handle of the thread decently.
E aprop huebre le mieg del apostema extendut sobre le liament e intromet le dit tieu en aquel indic e quereys le budel; e si tu l’as atrobat ni guardat per le liament, lahoras tu extratz alxorati e impelleys le budel a las partidas dedintz del ventre.	And then return the edge of the abscess that is extended over the ligament and introduce the mentioned tool into that indicated place and search for the intestine; and if you have found or guarded it by the ligament, then extract it carefully and push the intestine to the divided parts of the belly.
E si has atrobada la tela, lahoras pren aquel am unci; e inscideys las superfluitatz de lu.	And if you have found the membrane, then take it with a pinch; and cut away the excesses of it.
Mays si es contraria a tu arceria o vena, lahoras circunda aquel mot, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio; e pren dos agulhas e met en aquelas dos fiels fortz e entromet dos agulhas en le circuit le qual has feyt entorn le apostema en manieyra de crotz, las quals fassas penetrar; e aprop strenh le apostema en quatre partidas sobre las agulhas.	But if it is opposite to your artery or vein, then surround that spot, and return to your operation; and take two needles and insert them into those two strong threads and introduce two needles in the circle you have made around the abscess in a cross-like manner, which should penetrate; and then tie the abscess into four parts over the needles.
E si tu vols, osta las agulhas e leyssa le loc entro que poyresca la carn extenduda e caia per si; o inscideys aquel quan es subtiliat e se poyreys, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove dels enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And if you wish, remove the needles and leave the area where the extended flesh may scab over and fall by itself; or cut away what becomes thin and falls off, and then treat that wound with a poultice that is suitable for the ulcers until it is healed.
E si la eminencia del ombilic es de carn nada en lu o per humiditat, lahoras cove que tu conquaves le apostema ayssi cum havem dit e estraguas le sanc o la humiditat, la qual atrobas en lu, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove e que consolide le loc.	And if the elevation of the navel is due to nothing but flesh or humidity, then it is necessary that you conquer the abscess as we have said and drain the blood or humidity, which you find in it, and then treat it with a suitable remedy that consolidates the area.
Capitol .liii.	Chapter three.
De curacio de cranc.	Of the cure of cancer.
Ja havem dit, en la divisio, de specia de cranc e en qual manieyra es via a la curacio de lu am medicinas, e que es squivador en lu la curacio am ferr per so que no sia ulcerat; e havem dit cranc engendrat en la mayra e cautela de la curacio de lu.	We have said, in the division, of the species of cancer and in what manner it is via to the cure of it with medicine, and that it is necessary in the cure to use iron so that it does not become ulcerated; and we have said that cancer is engendered in the marrow and caution of the cure of it.
E diyssero les antics que alcunas veguadas cranc es en loc on es possibla la eradicacio de lu, ayssi cum de cran le qual es en las mamillas o en la coyssa e a lor semblantz dels membres allocat a estrayre tot aquel, e majorment quan es comensant petit.	And they said that the ancients that some excavated cancers are in a place where it is possible to eradicate them, thus like those on the breast or in the thigh and its similar members allocated to extract all that, and especially when it is commencing small.
Mays quan es antiquat e es gra, no cove que te propries a lu, quar yeu non pogui sanar de aquel alcu ni no he vist autre, ni que sia pervengut ad aquo.	More when it is ancient and grave, it is not good that you appropriate it for yourself, because I have not been able to heal from that or any other, nor have I seen anyone else who has succeeded in this.
E la operacio en lu es quan es allocat ayssi cum havem dit, es que tu precedescas e laysses le malaute e purgues de colera negra alcunas veguadas, e aprop sagna aquel, si es atrobada replecio manifesta.	And the operation on it is when it is allocated as we have said, that you should precede and prepare the patient and purge them of black bile, some excavated cancers, and then apply a sponge to that, if it is an atrabiated or manifest plethora.
E aprop prepara le malaute am preparacio en le qual sia locat am operacio, e aprop prohiceys en le trauc uncis les quals cove ad aquel; e aprop concava de tota part am la codena sego bona perexcrutacio entro que no romangua alcuna causa de las razitz de lu.	And then prepare the patient with preparation in which it is located for operation, and then prohibit on the trunk certain things that are suitable for this; and then concave all parts of the body so that there is a good purging between them so that no cause of the roots of it remains.
E layssa correr le sanc, e no abscidas aquel leugierament, e exprem les locs, e abstergeys le sanc gros tot am la tua ma o am instrument am le qual es a tu possible dels instruments.	Let the blood flow, and do not stop that purging, and squeeze the areas, and wipe away the thick blood with your hand or with an instrument, whichever is most convenient of the available instruments.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat de sanc gros inscizio de vena o de arceria, lahoras cauterisa aquela entro que·l flux del sanc sia cessat, e aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	If you find opposition from thick blood due to an incision of a vein or artery, then cauterize that which stops the flow of blood, and immediately treat it with another treatment until it is healed.
Capitol .liv.	Chapter five.
De curacio de ydropici.	On the treatment of dropsy.
Nos ja havem recomtat, en la divisio, de las specias de ydropici de l’aygua, e les senhals de quascuna especia, de la curacio de lu am medicinas.	We have already discussed, in the division, the species of dropsy and their symptoms, and the treatment of them with medicines.
E aquela la qual es curada am ferr no es sino la specia de althitas sola, e no es aproximat am ferr a la specia de timpanistres ni a la especia de yposarcha, quar aquo es mortal.	And that which is cured with iron is not except the species of altitudes alone, and it is not close to the species of tympanites nor to the species of hyposarca, because that is deadly.
E quan tu ja has medicat aquesta especia de ydropici timpanistre am medicinas e no comfereys la tua medicacio, lahoras considera, quar si al malaute ja es conseguida debelitat, o es am aquel autra malautia otra ydropici, ayssi cum si es en lu tos o cos de ventre e semblant ad aquels, lahoras guarda te que no le mediques am ferr, quar temor es sobre aquo.	And when you have medicated this species of dropsy called tympanites with medicines and do not confirm your medication, then consider, because if the patient has already achieved debility, or if there is another illness besides this dropsy, such as if it is in the chest or belly and similar to these, then beware that you do not medicate with iron, for fear is about that.
Mays si tu vezes le malaute de vertut exuberant, e am lu no es autra malautia sino ydropici tant solament, e no enfant ni vielh, lahoras la manieyra de la operacio de lu es que tu eleves le malaute entre las tuas mas, e le ministre aprop lu exprema le ventre de lu am la sua ma, enpellen la aygua a la partida dejos del pentenilh, e aprop pren spatum spinos segon aquesta forma:	If you see that the patient has an excess of vertut, and it is not another disease but rather just dropsy, and they are neither infant nor elderly, then the manner of the operation is that you raise the patient between your hands, and place your hand on the navel of theirs with your thumb, injecting water into the part of the intestine, and apply a spinal plaster according to this method:
sia de dos partz agudas lonc, de aguda extremitat ayssi cum spatum; mays empero sia en lu alcuna brevitat petit a petit, per so que en la operacio am aquel no passes entro al budel, e que ledas aquel.	It should be of two sharp parts, with a pointed extremity like a plaster; but however it should be brief in the patient's alcove, little by little, so that during the operation you do not enter into the intestine, and that you release that one.
E aprop considera si la generacio de ydropici es de part dels budels, quar lahoras cove que tu am la seccio te alonhes del ombelic per la quantitat de tres ditz a las partidas dejos, en le dreyt de lu sobre le pentenilh.	And consider if the generation of dropsy is from the part of the intestines, for it is necessary that you cut with the section near the navel for the quantity of three fingers to the lower parts, on the right side of theirs above the intestine.
Mays si la generacio de hydropici es per malautia del fietge, lahoras la tua seccio sia sinistra del ombilic per tres ditz.	If the generation of dropsy is due to disease of the liver, then your cut should be on the left of the navel for three fingers.
E si la generacio de lu es per la melsa, lahoras la tua seccio sia en le las dreyt.	And if the generation of it is due to the bladder, then your cut should be on the right side.
E no cove que la tua seccio sia sobre le costat sobre le qual vol jaser le malaute per que no corron las superfluitatz ad aquel loc freul.	And it is not suitable that your section be on the side where you want to treat the patient for which the excesses do not flow to that cold location.
E aprop perfora am le instrument tota la codena, e aprop entromet en aquela seccio, e eleva la tua ma am le spatum entre la codena e·l siphac, e tu excorja aquel; e si’ la quantitat de una ungla o enviro.	Then properly perforate the entire tube with the instrument, and insert it into that section, and raise your hand with the spatula between the tube and the siphon, and you will extract that; and if the quantity is of a fingernail or around it.
E aprop perforo le ciphac entro que pervengua le spatum al loc vuoyt, e es loc de l’aygua.	Then properly perforate the siphon so that the spatula reaches the empty location, which is the place of the water.
E aprop extratz aquel e entromet un instrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	And then extract it and insert an instrument of which this is the shape:
e es semblant a canula de argent subtil; es fayt de argent o de eram o de lato leon, al qual en la partida pus bassa de lu es un petit trauc, e en les costatz de lu so tres traucs: dos de una partida e un del autra partida; e fayta es la extremitat de lu insciza segon la manieyra de pluma, ayssi cum vezes:	and it is similar to a subtle silver cannula; it is made of silver or copper or tinned iron, on which in the lower part there is a small hole, and on the sides there are three holes: two on one side and one on the other; and the end of it is shaped like the feather of a pen, thus:
E en la extramitat de lu pus sobirana es armilla, quar quan le instrument perve al aygua, lahoras aquela tantost deysen sobre le instrument, donc evacua de l’aygua en la ora miega quantitat, quar si tu evacuas de aquela mes que no cove en la hora, fort leu mor le malaute per resolucio del sieu spirit animal, o accideys a lu cincopi que es appropinquada la mort.	And on the uppermost end of it there is a handle, because when the instrument reaches the water, then that water rises above the instrument, thus evacuating from the water to the mouth the same quantity, because if you evacuate more than what is suitable in an hour, it can kill the patient due to the resolution of their animal spirit, or bring on them the quintessence which is approaching death.
Mays evacua de aquela segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu e segon que significan a tu las disposicios del malaute de la vertut del pols de lu e de la bontat de lu.	Purge that quantity of the virtues of it according to what the disposition of the patient indicates regarding the virtue of its pulse and its goodness.
E aprop extrats le instrument, e rete l’aygua la qual causa es quar tantost es retenguda per la codena la qual rete le trauc que es sobre le ciphac del qual e recomtat a tu que perfores aquel segon aquela manieyra.	And then extract the instrument, and hold back the water which causes it to be so retained by the coding, which holds the tube that is on the navel of which it is recommended to you that you perform in that manner according to that method.
E aprop itera le instrument al autra dia si vezes le malaute tollerant aquo, e extratz de la aygua petita quantitat, e fay aquo per alcus jorns sobre temor, e guarda te de error entro que no romangua de l’aygua sino pauc.	And then insert the instrument on the other side if the patient tolerates it, and extract from the water a small quantity, and do this for several days without fear, and beware of error lest not much of the water remains.
Mays si tu temes sobre le malaute, e leyssas de l’aygua gran quantitat, lahoras cura aquel am sepultura en arena cauda, e mota suzor en banh, e al solelh espere per lonc temps; e cura aquel am medicinas dessicativas entro que sia sanat.	But if you fear for the patient, and a large quantity of water is released, then treat that one as if in a warm sand bath, and move them to a warm bath, and have them wait under the sun for a long time; and treat them with desiccative medicines until they are healed.
E cauteriza sobre le stomac, e la melsa e·l fitge aprop la extraccio de l’aygua, segon que yeu he recontat en aquo que es precedit.	And cauterize the stomach, and the middle and the liver after the extraction of the water, as it has been recounted to you in what has preceded.

De la curacio dels enfants les quals so natz les locs de la urina no-perforatz.	On the treatment of children whose urine holes are not perforated.
Alcunas veguadas alcun dels enfantz es eyssi del ventre de la sua mayre e·l cap de la sua mixtio no es perforat (o es trauc streyt o no es en son loc).	Some infants are born with a hole in their mother's womb and the head of their mixture is not perforated (or is tightly closed or is not in its place).
Donc cove coytar am perforacio de lu tantost que es nascut am spatum mot subtil segon aquesta forma:	Therefore, we must consider the perforation of it as soon as it is born with subtle movement according to this form:
E aprop pausa en le trauc un clavil subtil de plom e ligua aquel, e te per tres jorns o per .iiii.tre.	And then stop up the hole with a thin lead clip and tie it, and keep it for three days or for four.
E quant vol urinar sia remaugut e hurine; e aprop retorne aquel.	And when he wants to urinate it should be uncovered and urine allowed to flow; and then cover it again.
E si tu no pauses le plom, ja es possible que la urina la qual va sobre le loc, no leysa aquest claure.	And if you do not stop the flow with lead, it is possible that the urine which flows over the area will not close the opening.
Mays aquel del qual le trauc es streyt sia medicat am clavil de Plom, ayssi cum havem dit, per trops dias entro que sia amplificat.	More, that which has a tight hole should be treated with a lead clip, as we have said, for many days until it is widened.
Mays aquels en les quals es le trauc no en son loc, so leditz, la qual causa es quar de aquels, aquel que es nat e·l trau es deves la fi del cap de la vergua per que no pot urinar a las partidas dedintz, entro que eleva la vergua am la sua ma a las partidas desus; e no es a lu generacio, per so quar le sperma no pot pervenir a la mayre segon rectitut, e es malautia mot laga.	But those in whom the hole is not in its place, are deformed, for which reason there are some who are born with the hole of the penis at the end of the head of the member, so that they cannot urinate properly, until they lift the member to their mother's parts above; and it is not due to generation, because the sperm cannot reach the womb according to nature, and it is a very bad disease.
E la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que·l malaute sia envessat sobre le sieu dos, e aprop exten le cap de la vergua de lu am la tua ma sinistra am vehement extraccio, e inscideys le cap del cap de la vergua del loc del perpucii am spatum agut, ayssi cum es inscizio de pluma, o que tu ne razas alcuna partida, per so que·l mieg de lu vengua semblant al cap de la vergua e que le trauc caia en le mieg loc segon que cove.	And the manner of the operation on them is that the patient should be placed on their back, and then extend the head of the penis with your left hand with vehement extraction, and make an incision at the head of the penis at the place of the perineum with a sharp spatula, as if it were an incision of a feather, or so that you do not touch any part, so that the middle of the vein seems like the head of the penis and the tract falls in the middle place according to need.
E guarda te que en la tua operacio de flux de sanc, quar motas vetz accideys aquo; e pausa te a lu am aquo que abscindeys le sanc, e cura la plagua entro que si’ sanada.	And beware that in your operation of blood flow, many things can go wrong; and be careful with them that you abscess the blood, and cure the wound until it is healed.
Capitol .lvi.	Chapter 6.
De albater le qual accideys en le prepucii en le cap de la vergua e de corropcio e negror e adherencia del prepucii del cap de la vergua.	Of the treatment for what is done on the prepuce at the head of the penis and of the corruption and blackness and adhesion of the prepuce to the head of the penis.
Motas veguadas accideys aquest albater en la vergua e es eminencia de carn laga.	Many times this treatment is done on the penis and it is an excess of flesh growth.
E de aquela una es maligna e autra es no-maligna.	And one of them is malignant and the other is non-malignant.
No-maligna, cove que suspendas am unci subtil e abscindas aquela entro que aquela mondes tota; e aprop pausa sobre aquela coto submirgit en enguent egipciac; e aprop aquel, cura le am enguent diafinicon entro que sia sanat.	Non-malignant, it is necessary to suspend with a thin thread and cut that out until it all falls off; and then apply a poultice of submirgit, an Egyptian ointment, on the affected area; and then, treat it with diafinicon ointment until it is healed.

Moreover if the ulcer is on the foreskin of the uncircumcised penis, and one part of the ulcer is inside the foreskin and the other part is outside, then it is advisable that you remove the ulcer that is inside first until it is healed; and then you treat the outside one, because when you treat both at the same time, it is not certain that it will not be painful.
E ja eysamen accideys en les genetius e en le prepuci negror e corruccio, adonc cove que tu conquavas tot aquo que ja es denigrat e que ja se vol corrompre o que ja es corrumput; e aprop lineys sobre aquel aprop aquo am mel, le qual es contusit am farina de scorsa de milgrana e de errs trissatz e crivellatz.	And also examine the genital area and the blackened and corrupted foreskin, then it is advisable that you remove all that which is already decayed and that which is about to rot or has already rotted; and apply a liniment on that area made with honey, which is mixed with flour of wheat and of crushed and ground herbs.
E aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sana.	And then treat the one with the other cure until it is healthy.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, lahoras aministra cauteri lunar segon aquesta forma:	Moreover if there is an abundance of bloody flux, then administer lunar cautery in this manner:
quar cauteri juvatiu es a dos disposicios ensemps, so es a flux de sanc e a la plagua quan es corrumpuda.	for juvenile cautery is of two dispositions at the same time, one is for the flux of blood and the other is for the wound when it is corrupted.
E si le cap de la vergua es corrodut e es destruit tot en la hora, lahoras cove que tu intrometas en lo meat del prepucii una canula de plom per so que le malaute urina per aquela.	And if the head of the penis is corroded and destroyed entirely at that time, then it is necessary that you insert into the middle of the foreskin a lead tube so that the patient urinates through it.
En la adherencia del prepucii am le cap de la vergua (et aquesta adherencia no accideys sino en aquel del qual le prepucii es sa, e sobre lu no es exhigida circumcizio; e quan accideys adherencia per plagua o per apostema) cove que excorjas am spatum obtus entro que sia dissolvut le liament e sia deliurat le cap de la vergua de tota partida.	In the adherence of the foreskin to the head of the penis (and this adherence does not occur except in one whose foreskin is its own, and for whom circumcision is not required; and when adherence occurs due to a wound or an abscess) it is necessary that you scrape away the spatula until it is dissolved, the ligament is broken, and the head of the penis is freed from all that binds it.
E si es dificil desirnir aquelas exquisidament, lahoras cove que tu excorjes am spatum alcuna causa del cap de la vergua e del prepucii, e aysso es quar le prepucii, quan es subtil, fort leu es perforat per la sua subtilitat leugierament.	And if it is difficult to distinguish them thoroughly, then it is necessary that you scrape with the spatula some cause of the head of the penis and the foreskin, and thus it happens that the foreskin, when it is subtle, is perforated by its subtlety effortlessly.
E aprop separa entre·l prepucii e·l cap de la vergua am dra7 de li subtil, le qual ja es mulhat en l’aygua frega per que no adherescan autra veguada.	Then separate the foreskin from the head of the penis with a subtle instrument, which has been soaked in cold water so that they do not adhere again.
E aprop sia curat am vi stiptic entro que sia consolidat.	And then let it be treated with a strict styptic so that it is consolidated.
Capitol .lvii.	Chapter 48.
De mundificacio dels enfants e de la curacio de aquo que accideys ad aquels de circumcisio.	Of the purification of children and the treatment of that which occurs to those who are circumcised.
Circumcisio no es solucio de continuitat ayssi cum las autras plaguas: mays empero cum sia de la nostra operacio e de nostra voluntat, e lus de aquela sia propriament en les enfants, es necessari que asignem en aquela milhor operacio e via pus leugiera perdusent a salut.	Circumcision is not a solution for continuity problems: however, since it is of our operation and will, and its results are especially in children, it is necessary that we assign the best operation and way to lose weight to achieve health.
Donc dic que les antics no diyssero circumcisio en alcu dels lors libres, quar no n’usan en las suas leys, e no es sino quar havem aquisit per speriment, la qual causa es que yeu he atrobat la major partida dels artifexs e dels barbies usar circumcisir e mundificacio am novacula e am torores; e usan de liament am fiel e de inscizio am la ungla.	Thus, I say that the ancients did not recommend circumcision for their free men, because they didn't use it in their laws, and it's not because we have acquired it through experience, which is why most of the artisans and barbers have found that using circumcision and purification with a new knife and with tongs; and they use ligatures with thread and with needle.
E yeu ja he prohadas totas aquestas manieras e no atrobegui milhor mondificacio am forfexs, am liament am fiel que en mondificacio cum la ungla, quar motas vetz efugeys la codena pus desus, quar la codena del prepucii a dos tunicas, e roman la tonica pus dejos, e fort leu es forsat ad autra inscizio e dolor sicura.	And I have already forbidden all these methods and I do not find better purification with the fork, with ligature or with thread than purification with the nail, because many times the skin escapes from above, because the skin of the foreskin has two layers, and one layer is removed, and for the other it is necessary to make another incision and painful stitching.
E am mundificacio le qual es fayta per alphecati, e es digital, del qual usan les sabatiers, no es segurada la inscizio de la extremitat del membre viril, quar fort leu intra en le trau de lu.	And in the purification that is done by the barbers, and it's digital, which the surgeons use, the incision of the extremity of the virile member is not secured, because the foreskin enters into the hole of it.
Mays en la operacio am ungla, fort leu obazeys ferr e corromp la tua operacio.	More in the operation on the nail, the iron instrument breaks and corrupts the entire operation.
E la codena del enfant es breu per natura, e motas veguadas nays en tal manieyra que no ha necessitat de mondificacio, e yeu he vist aquel.	And the child's bowel is short by nature, and many times seen in such a manner that there is no need for modification, and I have seen it.
Mays de la mondificacio que·s fa am forfexs e liamentz am fiel, la bontat, experiment descrobic a mi, quar las forfexs so de proporcional inscizio, per aquo quar la acuitat que es desus es ayssi cum la acuitat que es dejos; e donc cum tu premes la tua ma so proporcionadas dos acuitatz, e inscideysso segon una comperacio en un temps; e es fayta compressio del fiel am figura contenent la codena de la vergua de tota partida, am le qual no catz error de tot.	More from the modification that is done with sutures and ligaments of the vein, the goodness, experiment reveals to me, that the sutures are of proportional incision, because the sharpness that is above is as the sharpness that is below; and thus when you press your hand proportionally on both sharps, and incise according to a comparison in one time; and it is made compression of the vein in a figure containing the intestine of the entire affected part, with which there is no error.
E la manieyra de la operacio primeyra es que tu fassas estar le enfant majorment si es de aquels que entendo un petit, que no fassas sino que tu lies le fiel en la sua vergua tant solament, e que leysses aquel entro al autra dia.	And the manner of the first operation is that you should make the child stay still if it is one of those who understand a little, that you should not do but rather you put the vein on its thigh only so much, and that you lift it up into the other day.
E aprop fay aquel alegrar en tota aquela manieyra que es a tu possibla de aquo que recep la sua intelligencia.	And then do this cheering in all that manner which is at your possibility, according to what receives its intelligence.
E aprop fa aquel estar entre las tuas mas estatuir preparadament, e no sia ges cezent; e occulta las forfexs en la tua ma o dejos le tieu pe, que l’enfant no veia aquelas ni degun autre dels instruments.	And then be between your hands, prepared and upright, and do not let it be seen; and hide the sutures in your hand or place them under your foot, so that the child does not see those nor any of the other instruments.

Then insert your hand into the patient's vagina and blow into the womb, and pull out what is stuck in the neck of the womb, and immediately cleanse that which has accumulated there due to rot.

Then lift the womb upwards and extract the head of the vagina; and slowly pour a small amount of liquid, because it is better; and sprinkle powder above and on the powder place a cloth in which has been infused mugwort mixed with oil and rosewater made recently; and lay that on top for another day; and treat that with treatment until it is healed.
La forma de las forfexs a mondificacio, aquesta es la forma:	The shape of the purging instruments for cleansing, this is the shape:
Sian las unas extramitatz no-talhantz e las autras sian talhant, que non sia yssit le ram del clau, e sia la longitut de las doas acuitatz ayssi cum la longitut de dos manubres engualment.	Some of the extremities are not-cut and the others are cut, so that the branch of the nail is not visible, and the length of the two fingers is as the length of two wrists together.

Donc cove que tu extendas aquela de la tua hora am la tua ungla denant la apostemacio del loc e que inscidas aquela segon equalitat.	Therefore, it is advisable that you extend your finger from your hand against the abscess of the place and that you press according to equality.
E si no la podes tenir am la tua ungla, lahoras extratz aquela am unci e inscideys aquela.	And if you cannot hold it with your finger, then extract it with a hook and press it.

But if three days have passed, and the matter that is inflated under the infected wound has not been discharged, then let it be that the aposteme is cut with caution, and excavate it with facility, and press it according to what you have prepared.

E si es inscidit de la codena sobre mesura, e obezeys a las partidas desus, aquo no notz a lu.	And if it is pressed on the bowel excessively, and the parts are separated from each other, this does not harm him.

Capitol .lviii.	Chapter 53.
De curacio de urina retenguda en la vesiqua.	Of the treatment of urine retained in the bladder.
Retencio de urina en la vesica es fayta per oppulacio fayta per peyra o per sanc congilat, o per poyre o per carnada, e semblantz ad aquels de aquo que havem dit de las manieyras de curacio en la divisio.	Retention of urine in the bladder is caused by obstruction made by stone or by congealed blood, or by polypus or by flesh, and it resembles those things that we have said about the methods of treatment in the division.
E si no es dissolvuda la urina, e veses retencio de lu esser per peyra le qual ja es en le col de la vesica, lahoras cove que le malaute sia encorbat sobre les sieus denolhs.	And if the urine is not dissolved, and there is retention of the substance in the body due to a stone that is already in the bladder, then it is necessary that the patient be placed on their back.
E aprop conponeys les pes de aquel sobre le sieu dos e extendas le sieu ventre de la partida pus desus del sieu dos, e le malaute estrengua le sieu ale tant quant es a lu possible.	And then place the feet of that one on the back of another and stretch out the belly of the affected part as much as possible from the back, and the patient should tighten their grip as much as they can.
Donc lahoras le col de la vesica es costreyt ha espulsio de la peyra a las partidas detras, per que la urina es absolta.	Therefore the neck of the bladder is constricted to expel the stone to the back parts, so that the urine is absorbed.
E si no es dissolvuda am aquo que havem dit he vehement es fayta la causa sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que aministres extraccio de lu am instrument le qual es apelat siringua, del qual aquesta es la forma: Sia de argent e sia subtil leon conquau, ayssi cum canula de pena de ausel am subtilitat de ray lonc en similitut d’un palm e mig, al qual sia cana subtil en le cap de lu.	And if it is not dissolved with the water that we have mentioned, then the cause is violently made on the patient, then it is necessary that you administer an extraction of it with an instrument that is called a syringe, of which this is the form: It should be of silver and the tube should be subtle, like a feather quill, or a reed cane in subtlety of a long straw, similar to half a palm, on which there is a subtle hole at the end.
E la manieyra del eyssiment de la urina per aquel es que prenguas le fiel doblat e lies en la extramitat de lu lana o coto per bona liadura; e entrometas las extramitatz del fiel en la partida dejos de la ciringua, e inscideys am las forfexs si superflueys alcuna causa de la lana, mays intromet la en la canula am vehemencia E aprop enongeys la ciringua am boder e am album de huou.	And the handling of the injection of urine with it is that you take the thread doubled and tie it at the extremity of the wool or cloth for a good ligature; and insert the extremities of the thread into the back part of the syringe, and cut with scissors if there is any superfluous cause of the wool, but insert more into the tube violently. And then attach the syringe to the vein and to the humerus.
E fay cezer le malaute sobre la selha, e embroca la vesiqua de lu e la vergua am olis umitz, e oli de oliva e ayguaros.	Make the patient lie on their side, and wrap the bladder of theirs and the rod with towels or cloths, and anoint them with olive oil and vinegar.
E aprop entromet la ciringua am facilitat entro que pervengua a la razit de la vergua; e aprop dobla la vergua desus a la partida del embelic; e aprop empelleys la ciringua dintz aquela; e aprop empelleys aquela entro que pervengua a la vesica, e aquela centa le malaute esser pervenguda a la causa vuoda, e no es fayt asso segon aquest orde, sino le meat en le qual va a tortuositat.	And then insert the sound into the facilitation so that it reaches to the root of the rod; and then double the rod upwards towards the division of the navel; and then press the sound inside that; and then press that until it reaches the bladder, and that makes the patient be reached by the desired cause, and it is not done thus according to this order, but as the case goes to tortuousness.
E aprop exten le fiel am la lana petit a petit, quar la urina siec la lana.	And then stretch the vein with the wool slowly, so that the urine touches the wool.
Aprop extratz aquela e fay per curacio urina, e usa ciringua, no cesses fer aquo e usa ciringua entro que sia evacuada la vesica e le malaute atrobe alleviacio.	Then extract that and do for the cure of urine, and use a sound, do not cease doing that and use a sound until the bladder is evacuated and the patient receives relief.
Capitol .lix.	Chapter 49.
De qualitat de clisterizacio de la vezica am clampcedra e am semblantz instrumentz les quals sian acordants ad aquo.	On the quality of injection into the bladder through a funnel and similar instruments which are suitable for this purpose.
Quan accideys en la vesica ulceracio o apostema, o sanc congilat en aquela, o es coartat poyredura, e vols en aquela destillar ayguas e medicinas, lahoras sia fayt am instrument le qual es apelat clampcedra, e aquesta es la forma de lu:	When there is an ulcer or abscess in the bladder, or congealed blood in it, or it is obstructed by pus, and you want to distill waters and medicines into it, then it should be done with an instrument which is called a funnel, and this is its form:
sino que en la extramitat de lu es sorda, so es clausa.	But rather that in the extremity of it, it is numb, and thus closed.
Et en aquela so tres traucs: dos de la una partida , ayssi quo vezes.	And in that one there are three holes: two from one side, as many times.
En le comensament es loc concau, en le qual es aquo que es enpellit, e sia segon quantitat que oppile aquel, ses addicio, entro que quan alcuna causa es ab aquel tirada de las humiditatz, sia atirada, e quan es expellida, am aquo sia atirada, e quan es expellit lonc, segon que fa clampcedra am la qual es phicat naphta en las batalhas de mar.	In the beginning it is a concave place, in which there is that which is injected, and it is according to the quantity that oppresses that one, until when some cause is pulled from the humidity, it is pulled, and when it is expelled, with it being pulled, and when it is expelled for a long time, according as it makes clampcedra, with which naphta is fixed in the battles of the sea.
Donc cum tu vols prohicir humiditatz en la vesica, entromet la extremitat de clapcedra en la humiditat, e atira am aquel aquo que es empellit a las partidas desus, quar la humiditat es atirada en la conquavitat de clapcedra.	Therefore when you want to project humidity in the bladder, insert the extremity of clampcedra into the humidity, and pull with it that which is injected to the lower parts, so that the humidity is pulled into the cavity of clampcedra.
E aprop entromet la extramitat de clapcedra en la vergua segon que havem recomtat en la ciringua; e aprop empelleys la humiditat am aquo que empelleys, quar aquela humiditat perve a la vesica tantost, e le malaute cent aquela.	And then insert the extremity of clampcedra into the rod according to what we have recommended in the circling; and then inject the humidity with that which you inject, so that that humidity reaches the bladder as much as possible, and the patient feels it.
Forma del cristeri subtil am le qual la vesica es cristerizada, e es aquela la forma:	Shape of the subtle bladder channel in which the bladder is channeled, and this is the shape:
E sia fayta de argent o de lato, de la qual le cap pus aut sia semblant a petita pluma, e dejos lu cana dedintz liament.	And let it be made of silver or of gold, from which the head is formed in a manner similar to a small plum, and give them the cane with a gentle handle.
E aprop pren vesica de moto, e pausa en aquela la humiditat que vols cristirizar en la vesica, e aprop lia aquela entre dos am fort liguatura am fiel doble, e escalfa aquela humiditat sobre le foc.	And take the bladder of motion, and pause in it the humidity that you want to crystallize in the bladder, and bind it between two strong ligatures with double thread, and evaporate that humidity over the fire.
E aprop entromet la extremitat del cristeri en la vergua.	And then insert the extremity of the crystalizer into the rod.
E aprop estrenh la tua ma sobre la vesica am la humiditat am strectura descent entro que·l malaute centa que aquela humiditat ja es pervenguda a la vesica.	And then tighten your hand over the bladder with the humidity and strict structure, so that it enters into the patient's sense that the humidity has already passed into the bladder.
Mays si a tu no es present vesica, lahoras tu pren una pessa de parguames e fay de aquel cercle; e perfora aquel de tota la sua retonditat; e aprop entromet fiel fort en aquels traucs, ayssi quo so revolgut; e aprop agregua le cercle ayssi quo es agreguat alsofatur, pus que tu pausas en aquel aquo que tu vols de las humiditatz, e olis e ayguas.	But if the bladder is not present to you, then take a piece of bladder membrane and make a circle from it; and perforate that with all its thickness; and then insert a strong thread into those channels, so that they are turned inside out; and then tie the circle in such a way that it is tied also by the fascia, because you put in that water that you want to drain, along with the humors and liquids.
E aprop tu lia aquel en le instrument e fay am aquel ayssi cum has fayt am la vesica, e exprescio am la tua ma entro que la humiditat pervengua a la vesica.	And then tie that to the instrument and do with it as you have done with the bladder, and express with your hand that the humidity enters into the bladder.
Capitol .lx.	Chapter Twelve
De extraccio de peyra.	Of the extraction of stones.
Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas, e la diferencia entre peyra engendrada en los ronhos e peyra engendrada en la vesica, e les senhals de aquela.	We have already spoken in the division of the species of stones and their cure with medicines, and the difference between stone generated in the kidneys and stone generated in the bladder, and its symptoms.
E havem dit la peyra en la qual catz operacio am ma, e seccio.	And we have said which stone requires surgical operation on it, and section.
E la peyra engendrada en la vesica propriament es aquela que es ficada en la vesica.	And the stone generated in the bladder properly is that one which is fixed in the bladder.
E yeu so narrant aquel am exposicio manifesta e abreviacio.	And I will now narrate to him with clear explanation and abbreviation.
Donc dic que peyra engendrada en la vesica majorment ve als enfantz; e dels senhals de lu es que la urina que es eyssida de la vesica es semblant a aygua en la sua subtilitat, e apar en aquela arena; e le malaute fregua la sua vergua, e motas veguadas pen, e aprop es dressada; e am aquo yeys foro le cul en motz de aquels.	Therefore I say that stone generated in the bladder mostly goes to children; and of its symptoms is that the urine which is excreted from the bladder seems like water in its thinness, and sand appears in it; and the patient rubs his penis, and many times a thread comes out, and then it is dressed; and with this he has pain in the anus, in many of these cases.
E es laugiera la sanacio dels enfants de aquela entro que han conseguitz xiiii ans; e es dificil curacio en les viels.	And it is rare for children under fourteen years to achieve healing; and it is a difficult cure in the elderly.
Mays en les joves es migiera per aquo quar es entre aquels.	But in young people, it is moderate because that is between the two.
E de aquel del qual la peyra es major e la curacio es pus leugiera; E si es pauca, es contraria ad aquela.	And concerning one whose stone is larger and the cure is easier; if it is small, it is contrary to that.
Donc cum pervenem a la curacio de aquela, cove al comensament de aquela que mondifiquem le malaute am cristeri le qual extragua tota la fenda la qual es en les sieus budels; quar aquela fenda alcunas veguadas prohibeys la envencio de la peyra deves la inquisicio de lu.	Therefore, when we come to the treatment of this, it is advisable at the beginning to cleanse the patient with a crucible which draws out all the wound which is in their intestines; because this wound, by certain prohibitions, prevents the penetration of the medicine into the intestine.
E aprop sia pres le malaute am les sieus pes e sia contosit e maugut enjos per so que la peyra descenda al preon de la vesica, o que saute de loc aut alcunas veguadas.	And then take hold of the patient with their feet elevated and constricted, and massage them in such a way that the medicine descends to the pressure of the bladder, or jumps from one place to another certain times.
E aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas preparat, e las mas de lu sian dejos las coysas de lu, per so que la vesica tota sia fayta declinant a las partidas dejos.	And then make that which is prepared between your hands, and the hands of the patient are placed on their hips, so that the whole bladder is made to decline towards the parts below.
E aprop perquier aquela e tota aquela deforo.	And then massage thoroughly that and the entire affected area.
Donc si sentes la peyra en l’espazi, lahoras tu te coyta tantost am seccio sobre lu.	Therefore, if you feel the medicine in the space, then you will be satisfied as long as it is dry on them.
E si no catz de tot dejos le tieu tocament, lahoras cove que tu untes am oli le tieu dit indic de la ma sinistra, si malaute es enfant, o le dit miga si es jove complit, e entrometas aquel en le sieu cul.	And if it does not touch all of the thigh, then it is necessary that you anoint with oil the inner side of the left hand, if the patient is a child, or the right hand if they are a young adult, and insert this into their anus.
E perquier de la peyra entro que stia dejos le tieu dit.	And massage the medicine until it reaches inside where your finger touches.
E converteys aquela petit a petit entro al col de la vesica.	Turn that small one little by little into the neck of the bladder.
E aprop prem sobre aquel am lo tieu dit, e expelleys aquel a las partidas defora ves le loc del qual vos la seccio.	And press firmly on that with the aforementioned tool, and extract it from the divided parts before the area where you made the incision.
E comanda al ministra que prema la vesica am la sua ma; e comanda a un autra ministra que am la sua ma dextra extenda les genetius a las partidas desus, e am la sua autra ma remaugua la codena la qual es dejos les genetius, en partida del loc en le qual se fa la seccio.	Command the assistant to press the bladder with their hand; and command another assistant with their right hand to pull apart the thighs to the divided parts below, and with their other hand to hold back the cod (or intestine) which is near the thighs, away from the area where the incision is made.
E aprop entromet espatum be inscident del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And then insert the spatula to make an incision of which this is the shape:
e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat.	And cut in it what is between the anus and the thighs, not in the middle place, but to the side of the left thigh; and let the incision be above that stone and the aforementioned tool be in the anus, and let the incision be transverse, so that the incision before is wide and the depth according to the quantity that the stone has grown to be possible, and not larger, because the tool would compress the stone which is in the anus, and it is forgotten with difficulty.
E sapias que de la peyra es alcuna a la qual so angle e margers, per que le eyssiment de lu es fayt deficil per aquo.	And know that there is some part of the stone to which are attached angles and margins, because the extraction of it is made difficult by this.
E de aquela aquo es leon semblant a glan, e es redonda, e es fayt de lu leugier eyssiment.	And of that water, there is a tumor similar to a gland, and it is round, and it is made from the lighter excrement.
Donc si es aquela al qual so angles e marger, ajusta en la fissura.	Then if it is the one which has edges and margin, adjust it in the cleft.
E si no es ayssi foro-getada, lahoras cove que tu engenes sobre aquel, o que strenguas sobre aquel am gesti decentment, la extremitat del qual sia ayssi cum lima am le qual strenguas sobre la peyra, e no evasesca de lu; o que entrometas dejos lu instrument subtil de curvada extremitat.	And if it is not thus outwardly protruding, then you should put your hands on that, or you should bind around that with decent gesture, the extremity of which is thus like a file on which you bind to the stone, and does not escape from it; or you insert the subtle instrument of curved extremity.
Mays si tu no podes sobre aquel, lahoras tu amplifica le trauc un petit, e si tu veus flux de sanc, abscindeys en strenh aquel am vitriol trissat.	But if you cannot operate on that, then you widen the hole a little, and if you see a flow of blood, bind it with a string treated with vitriol.
Mays si la peyra es mays de una, lahoras al comensament tu impelleys la ma a la boca de la vesica, e aprop inscideys sobre lu; e aprop impelleys un petit aprop aquo; e semblantment fay si son motas mays de doas.	But if the stone is more than one, then at the beginning you apply the hand to the mouth of the bladder, and immediately you cut into it; and immediately you apply a little water; and similarly you do if there are many stones.
E si es peyra mot gran, lahoras ignorancia es que tu inscidas aquel am gran seccio, quar accideys al malaute una de doas causas: o que mora o que endevengua a lu destillacio de urina continuabla, per aquo quar le loc no es de tot consolidat.	And if it is a very large stone, then ignorance is that you cut into it with a large incision, for you bring to the patient one of two causes: either death or that it impedes the flow of urine, because of which the area is not completely consolidated.
Mays aministra expulcio de lu entro que sia fora-getada, o engenia en la fractura de lu am las forfexs entro que extragua aquela en pessas.	May administer expulsion of what is retained inside, or apply a poultice to the fracture in the area of the foot where it extrudes the pus in the flesh.
Donc cum tu auras cumplit la tua opperacio, lahoras omple la plagua de enses de aloe e de sanc de drago, e strenh aquel.	Then when you have completed your operation, fill the wound with poultices of aloe and dragon's blood, and tighten that.
E pausa sobre aquel drap enfus en oli e vi, o en oli rozat e aygua frega, per so que apostema caut sia cedat.	And place on it a cloth soaked in oil and wine, or in rosated oil and cold water, so that the postema may be alleviated.
E aprop resupina le malaute sobre le sieu col, e no deslias le liament entro al tertz dia.	And then raise the patient on their back, and do not untie the dressing for three days.
E cum aquel auras desliat, embroca le loc am aygua e mot oli, e aprop cura aquel am enguent diafinicon e am enguent diabazilicon entro que sia sanat.	And when that is untied, wash the area with water and warm oil, and then treat it with a gentle ointment called diafinicon and a special ointment called diabazilicon until it is healed.
Mays si en la plagua accideys apostema caut, adhust e corrosiu, e de aquel semblantz ayssi cum si le sanc es en la vesica congelat, e per lu es la hurina prohibida (e aquo es conogut per la egressio del sanc am urina), a donc entromet lo tieu dit en la plagua e extratz aquel sanc, quar si roman provoca la vesica a corropcio de la vesica e de lu putrefaccio.	May it happen that in the wound an aposteme, a fever and a corrosion, occur, and it seems as if the blood is congealed in the bladder, and because of this the urine is prohibited (and this is known through the excretion of blood with urine), then anoint the said ointment on the wound and extract that blood, for if it remains it provokes corruption of the bladder and its putrefaction.
E aprop lava la plagua am vi agre, aygua e sal, e am opposicio a tota specia, am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then wash the wound with vinegar and water, and apply an opposite treatment to all species, according to what is convenient for the cure of the disease.
E cove en las horas de tota la curacio que tu lies amdos las coyssas e ajustes las medicinas las quals so pausadas sobre le loc.	And take in the hours of all the treatment that you apply both to the thighs and adjust the medicines which are placed on the area.
E si la peyra es petita e es en le meat de la vergua, e es ficat en lu, e eyssement de urina es prohibit, lahoras cura aquel am aquo que yeu recomti denant que pervenguas a seccio, quar tropas veguadas per aquesta curacio yest acusat de seccio; e ja yeu e esproat aquo, e es que tu prenguas un perforador de ferr alfelut, del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if the stone is small and is in the middle of the bladder, and is stuck in it, and urination is difficult, then treat that with what you have recommended before, because many times this treatment has been accused of causing retention; and now take a iron perforator, whose form is this:
de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	of triangular extraction, pointed, stuck in a wooden handle.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	And then take a thread, and tie it to the bladder and to the stone so that it does not return to the bladder.
E aprop entromet le ferr en la vergua, perforant am fecilitat entro que·l perforador vengua ad aquela peyra.	And then insert the iron into the bladder, perforating with ease until the perforator reaches that stone.
E revolveys le perforador am la tua ma en aquela peyra petit a petit, e tu perforsa la perforacio de lu entro que fassas aquel del autra part penetrar; quar la urina tantost es absolta.	And turn the perforator with your hand on that small stone, little by little, and you make the perforation of it until you make the other part penetrate; because the urine is then freed.
E aprop prem la tua ma sobre aquo que es romas de la peyra de la partida deforo de la vergua, quar aquela es trinquada, e es foro-getada am la urina, e le malaute es sanat.	And then press your hand on that which is broken from the stone of the partition of the flow of the urine, because it is pierced, and it is outside with the urine, and the patient is healed.
Mays si aquesta curacio no es a tu aparelhada per alcuna causa la qual prohibeys de aquela, lahoras lia un fiel dejos la peyra, e autra fiel desus la peyra.	If this cure is not suited to you for some reason that prohibits it, then apply a thread below the stone, and another thread above the stone.
E aprop encideys sobre la peyra en aquela vergua entre doas liaduras.	And then bind around the stone on that member between two ligatures.
E aprop extratz aquela.	And then extract it.
E aprop deslia le liament e mondifica le sanc congilat, le qual es fayt en la plagua.	And then dissolve the ligament and purify the congealed blood, which is formed in the wound.
E no es necessari liament de fiel dejos la peyra, sino per que no retorne a la vesica, e l’autre liament desus sino, quar quan es desliat le fiel aprop la egrecio de la peyra, la codena retorna a son loc e cobra la plagua.	And it is not necessary to have a ligament of thread below the stone, but only so that it does not return to the bladder, and the other ligament above, because when the thread is dissolved, the cord immediately returns to its place and covers the wound.
E per aquo es a tu necessari quan lias le fiel desus, que tu eleves la codena a las partidas desus, o que retorne deves le tieu compliment, e cobra la plagua ayssi co havem dit.	And for this reason it is necessary when you tighten the thread above, that you elevate the cord to the upper parts, or that it returns to give you the suitable complement, and covers the wound as we have said.
Capitol .lxi.	Chapter 61.
De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	On the extraction of stone from women.
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	Pain in the women's thighs is rarely generated.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	If pain appears in some of those areas, then the treatment of it is difficult, and it is forbidden by many manners.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	One of them is when the woman has strong thighs.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	And the second is when you do not find a woman with knowledge to describe to the doctor what is cast, or it is from women having been married.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	The third is when you do not find a woman who knows this art, especially the operation with the hand.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	And the fourth is that the place of the incision near the pain in the women's thighs is far from the place of the pain, for which a deep incision is indicated, and in this there is fear.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	But if necessity calls you to that, then take a woman doctor who is knowledgeable, and she is rarely found.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	But if you are deprived of that, then seek a doctor who is skilled and subtle, or present a female midwife who is experienced in the care of women, or a woman who has a share of knowledge in this art.
Donc fay aquela present, e comanda a lu que fassa tot aquo que tu li mandaras, de la enquisicio sobre la peyra al comensament; la qual causa es que reguarde si la femna es verges, lahoras cove que meta lo sieu dit en le cul de lu e quiera la peyra.	Then make that one present, and command her to do all that you order her, from the examination of the pain to the beginning of treatment; which thing is that you examine if the woman is strong, then put your finger in her buttocks and touch the pain.
Donc si atroba aquela, coarte aquela dejos le sieu dit, e lahoras comanda a lu que inscida sobre aquela.	Therefore, if you take that away, cut it from the diseased part, and then command someone to write on it.
Mays si no es verge, lahoras comanda a la matrona que entrometa lo sieu dit en le conh de la malauta e enquiera sobre la peyra, pus que pausa la sua ma sinistra sobre la vesica, e comprem aquela am bona comprecio.	But if it is not a vein, then command the midwife to insert the diseased part into the womb of the patient and inquire about the stone, because she will place her left hand on the bladder, and squeeze it with good compression.
Donc si atroba aquela, lahoras cove que gradantment maugua aquela de l’orrifici de la vesica a las partidas dejos am somman de la sua vertut entro que pervengua am aquel a la razit de la coyssa.	Therefore, if you take that away, then it is good that it gradually draws the stone from the orifice of the bladder to the divisions of the urine with the sum of its virtue entering so that it comes to the root of the thigh.
E aprop inscida sobre aquela apposicio de la maytat del conh deves la razit de la coyssa de qualque part sia a lu parada e cent la peyra en aquela partida, e·l dit de lu no sia remaugut de la peyra coartan dejos lu.	And then write on that application of the matrix of the womb towards the root of the thigh from whichever part it may be to the bladder, and cut the stone in that division, so that the stone is not returned by the bladder, cutting it from the urine.
E la seccio sia pauca al comensament; e aprop entrometa lo ray sobre aquela seccio, e si sent la peyra, lahoras ajuste en seccio segon la quantitat la qual sap que la peyra sira getada de aquela.	And let the section be small at the beginning; and then insert the tool into that section, and if you feel the bladder, then adjust in the section according to the quantity which you know the bladder will be emptied of it.
E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	And you should know that the species of bladder stones are many: for some of them are small and large, and rough and sharp, and long and round, and having roots.
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	Therefore you should know how many species are of it for that which you signify about that which you want.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, ajusta en le loc vetriol trissat e te aquela per una hora entro que sia abscindit le sanc, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	And if you see a flow of blood, adjust on the spot a veterinary tourniquet and leave it for an hour until the blood is stopped, then return to your operation while the stone is expelled.
E fay que prepares am tu dels instrumentz les quals e ditz en la extraccio de peyra en les homes, per so que sias ajudat per aquels en la tua operacio.	And make that you prepare for yourself the instruments which are said in the extraction of stone in men, so that you may be helped by them in your operation.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, e sabes que la expulcio del sanc es de la arceria que es insciza, lahoras tu pausa polvera sobre le loc e estrenh aquel am pulvils e strictura descent, e no iteras aquo; e layssa la peyra e no extraguas aquela, quar fort leu morira la malauta.	And if you see a flow of blood, and you know that the expulsion of blood is from the artery that is cut, then you apply powder on the spot and bind it with cloths and tight bandage, and do not repeat this; and leave the stone and do not extract it, because soon the patient will die.
E aprop cura la plagua.	And then heal the wound.
Donc cum es cedada la acuitat del sanc aprop alcus jorns, e·l loc se poyreys, lahoras tu retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	Therefore when the flow of blood has ceased, then clean the spot, and return to your operation while the stone is expelled.
Capitol lxii.	Chapter 62.
De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	Of section concerning hernia treatment.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	Hernia is nothing but an accumulation of humidity in the white drop which is behind the membrane of the genitals containing the seed, and it is called a drop.
